## Survey of Consumer Finances

This site contains a sample of variables from 2019. You can download the data [here](https://sda.berkeley.edu/sdaweb/analysis/?dataset=scfcomb2019).

This dataset is particularly useful if you're interested in wealth.

More information [here](https://www.federalreserve.gov/econres/aboutscf.htm).
